mu.description: A tall central trunk stands firm, with two shorter diagonal strokes spreading outward as branches and a hooked stroke rooting downward.

bing.description: Two thin, slanted strokes drop like icicles from a frozen ledge, marking the presence of cold.

shui.description: A long vertical line flows downward as the main current, with shorter flicks to each side and a final dot suggesting a stray droplet.

huo.description: A central spark flares into two sweeping curved strokes like dancing flames, with a falling stroke beneath hinting at embers.

shan.description: Three vertical peaks rise side by side, the center slightly taller, forming a rugged mountain silhouette.

shi.description: A short, angled top stroke forms a rocky cliff edge, above a heavy square base that embodies the solidity of stone.

tian.description: A large outer square frames the land, with two vertical and two horizontal lines dividing it into four neat plots.

ri.description: A bold square outline encloses a shorter central stroke, focusing the intensity of the sun’s core.

yue.description: A gently curved left stroke suggests a crescent shape, while internal lines mark lunar phases across the month.

qing.description: Two sweeping curves at the top gesture like fresh shoots, balanced by a symmetrical base that grounds clarity and brightness.

bai.description: An open top stroke widens space above, while a small dot inside concentrates the essence of purity.

yu.description: A heavy horizontal line holds like a cloud, with four evenly spaced vertical strokes dropping below as raindrops.

ren.description: Two slanting strokes meet at the top and flare apart at the base, evoking the stance of a standing person.

yan_three.description: A rectangular ‘mouth’ sits below five horizontal lines, the lines symbolizing the flow of spoken words.

nu.description: A bent figure kneels with arms crossed, the curve of the back and limbs indicating traditional female posture.

zi.description: A small horizontal lid and curled legs form the outline of a child wrapped or cradled in swaddling.

shou.description: Four short strokes fan out from a vertical line like fingers, with a curved stroke at the base representing a palm.

mu_two.description: A rectangular frame encloses a central dot, the frame as eyelids and the dot as the pupil.

kou.description: A perfect square with even sides, marking the boundary of an open mouth or entrance.

wei.description: Two horizontal strokes rise but don’t connect fully, and a vertical stroke stops short, showing incompletion.

ge.description: A straight shaft extends diagonally with a hooked blade affixed, illustrating the form of a dagger-axe.

zhi.description: A foot with four forward toes and a short heel stroke, the toes splayed to signal firm placement.

mian.description: A gently arching stroke curves over two short vertical legs, forming the silhouette of a roof.

guang.description: A slanted roof slash opens widely to the right, supported by a short vertical leg, suggesting an open shelter.

hu.description: A rectangular panel tilts open on a single vertical hinge stroke, marking the entrance of a household.

fang.description: A pointed stroke juts out from a square base, combining shape and orientation in one form.

men.description: Two vertical posts enclose a pair of swinging panels, each panel marked by an inward taper.

tu.description: A short horizontal cap rests atop a vertical stroke that anchors into a squat base, suggesting earth piled up.

jin.description: A single vertical line drapes downward with two small side strokes, evoking a hanging cloth.

che.description: A rectangular frame sits on four short legs, each leg ending in a small circle to suggest wheels.

fu.description: A wide horizontal cap sits atop two vertical legs, the cap sloping downward like the crest of a small hill and the legs rooting it into the ground.

cao.description: Three short diagonal strokes fan out across the top like blades of grass, while the two horizontal lines beneath bind them together as one clump.

he.description: A slanted stalk rises with a hooked tip, and pairs of small strokes branch off on either side like unfolding grain kernels.

mi.description: A central vertical line anchored by a crossbar intersects two diagonal strokes on each side, suggesting scattered rice grains around a stalk.

dou.description: A rounded top sits above a rectangular container outlined by strokes, the form hinting at beans stored in a pod or vessel.

li.description: A vertical spine rises through a short horizontal cap, flanked by two small side strokes like arms, forming the upright posture of a standing person.

dao.description: A single curved stroke tapers to a sharp point, with a short perpendicular handle stroke at the base, evoking a blade on its haft.

bi.description: A vertical line curves outward at its tip into a small bowl shape, resembling the scoop of a ladle on a handle.

gong.description: A single elegant curve arches from end to end, forming the flexible limb of a bow ready to launch an arrow.

mao.description: A long vertical shaft topped by a pointed triangle, the tip flaring outward like the head of a spear.

ji.description: A curved horizontal line crowns a short vertical stroke, forming the tabletop and single leg of a small stand.

gong_two.description: Two horizontal strokes sandwich a single vertical line, suggesting the structured form of tools or craftsmanship.

fang_five.description: A right-angle stroke opens to the right and down, forming an open container or box shape.

you_two.description: Four short strokes extend from a central axis like fingers, while a hook at the base marks the thumb of a right hand.

ba.description: Two diverging strokes start from a single point and split outward, visually dividing the space into two parts.

jin_two.description: A curved blade stroke sits above a short handle line, the blade’s angle suggesting the chopping action of an axe.

gong_three.description: Two parallel horizontal strokes arch upward like cupped hands, ready to carry or hold an object.

you_three.description: A bulbous container sits atop a narrow stem, the rounded belly and narrowed neck evoking a wine vessel.

yang.description: A horizontal line with radiating diagonal strokes above suggests the sun’s rays rising over the horizon.

qi.description: A swirling main stroke curls upward with small side flicks, capturing the drifting motion of steam or vapor.

you_four.description: A vertical line runs through a small box, indicating origin or source within a contained space.

xin_two.description: Four inward strokes converge toward the center, forming the core shape of a heart or mind.

xin_three.description: Three vertical ticks lean slightly right, capturing the flow of emotion emanating from the heart.

jin_three.description: A horizontal stroke shelters a person-like hook below, symbolizing the current moment under a roof of time.

wang.description: A small dot floats above a horizontal line and sweeping downward stroke, suggesting something lost or vanished.

fei.description: Two mirrored diagonal strokes cross over each other, expressing negation or incorrectness through reversal.

xiang.description: An eye radical on the right peers beside a standing tree on the left, linking vision and reflection in mutual appearance.

gen.description: A vertical hook stem rises above two short strokes, the hook halting upward motion to convey stopping and firmness.

ji_three.description: A curling stroke loops around itself in compact form, symbolizing the self contained within its own boundaries.

bao.description: An enclosing stroke arches over a wrapped bundle, forming a single enclosure that holds contents inside.

ding.description: A horizontal line rests atop a vertical stroke, the simple peg shape signifying a small nail or male spirit.

xi.description: A sweeping left stroke curves downward, ending in a hook that evokes the setting sun at dusk.

yi.description: A single horizontal stroke stands alone, representing the concept of one or unity.

cun.description: A short vertical stroke capped by a tiny hook and base line marks a small measure, the inch unit.
